name: Abyssal Blade
description: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

abilities.name: Overwhelm
abilities.description: Instantly stuns the target enemy unit. Pierces debuff immunity.
notes: The caster is ordered to attack the target on cast.
The effect is applied instantly, despite the visual effects.

abilities.name: Bash
abilities.description: Grants the wielder's attacks a chance to stun the target and deal bonus physical damage.
notes: The bonus damage is considered as a conditional attack damage bonus.
Does not work against wards and buildings, but works against allied units.
Bash uses a custom cooldown system.
Multiple instances of Skull Basher-based Bash do not stack.
Does not stack with Bash of the Deep, Greater Bash, and Time Lock.
This ability is inactive on Clones.
Goes on cooldown when Overwhelm is cast.
Adds an average of 30 and 12 damage to every attack for melee and ranged heroes respectively.

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 572 health and 2.6 health regeneration.
26 main attack damage to Strength heroes.
11.7 main attack damage to Universal heroes.
For Sange-based items: Multiple sources of slow resistance do not stack.
Multiple sources of health restoration amplification do not stack.
